EventAttacker.label: Event Attacker
EventAttacker.description: The player who caused the event (e.g. the killer)

EventDamage.label: Event Damage
EventDamage.description: The amount of damage dealt in the event

EventLocation.label: Event Location
EventLocation.description: The location where the event occurred

EventPlayer.label: Event Player
EventPlayer.description: The primary player involved in the event

EventTeam.label: Event Team
EventTeam.description: The team involved in the event

EventVictim.label: Event Victim
EventVictim.description: The player who was the victim of the event

EventWeapon.label: Event Weapon
EventWeapon.description: The weapon used in the event
